questions.clue: For $200: This icy treat, perfect for a hot day, was accidentally invented in 1904 in Toronto by a soda jerk named Frank Epperson.

This creature from Scottish folklore is said to inhabit the waters of Loch Ness.
questions.answer: What is the Loch Ness Monster?
